pages.text: A $(item)Sign$() is a non-solid block that displays text and can be placed on the top or side of other blocks. $(br2)A $(item)Hanging Sign$() is a decorative block that also displays text, and can be placed underneath blocks or with a solid self-supporting bracket. $(br2)They can be crafted from any type of wood.

$(item)Signs$() can be waxed by using a $(item)Honeycomb$() on it. Once waxed, it cannot be unwaxed or edited. $(br2)You can change the text color by using a $(item)Dye$() on it. $(br2)You can use a $(item)Glow Ink Sac$() to make its text glow. $(br2)You can use a regular $(item)Ink Sac$() to remove the glowing effect.
